name: Socket.io extension
body:
# Welcome to Socket.io extension by Mrcomputer1

[Download the helper application](https://github.com/Mrcomputer1Extensions/socket.io-extension/releases)

[Use the extension (helper application required to be running)](https://scratchx.org/?url=http://Mrcomputer1Extensions.github.io/socket.io-extension/Extension/socket.io.extension.js)

[Source Code](https://github.com/Mrcomputer1Extensions/socket.io-extension/blob/gh-pages/Extension/socket.io.extension.js)

[Report an issue](https://github.com/Mrcomputer1Extensions/socket.io-extension/issues/new)

# Blocks
## BUTTON: Create \[event name\]
Creates event
## HAT: On \[event name v\]
Code run when event is received
## BLOCK: Emit \[event name v\]
Send the event
## REPORTER: Get \[variable name\] from \[event name\]
Get variable from event
## BLOCK: Set \[variable name\] to \[variable value\] on \[event name\]
Set variable for event
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
